alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 7:30AM AKST until January 04 at 1:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 AM AKST THURSDAY THROUGH THOMPSON PASS... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Visibility reduced to one half at times. Northeast winds gusting 25 to 35 mph. * WHERE...Thompson Pass. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 1 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will develop midday today and become steadier through the afternoon and evening hours. Winds will gradually strengthen through the day. While snowfall will be quite light, low density snow will easily blow around and reduce visibility. Winds will diminish this evening into the overnight hours, while heavier snow will develop overnight through early Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
